Functions¶

app_folder.routes.createaccount()¶

Create account page

Changelog:

Isaac 04/19: establishment of page excluding database implementation

app_folder.routes.index()¶

Returns the rendered ‘index.html’ template.

Parameters:

none

Returns:

render_template(‘index.html’): the rendered version of the index HTML page, which has the website title, a link to the login page, and a link to the create-account page

Changelog:

Saima 4/19: created homepage in index.html

app_folder.routes.login()¶

Create address for Login page

Returns to:

login.html. forms.py for LoginForm class. Sign In

Changelog:

4/19 Ali

Dylan 4/19: Added session username, changed flash message

app_folder.routes.logout()¶

Pops the session username

Changelog:

Dylan 4/19: Created initial implementation

class app_folder.forms.LoginForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

Create form for Login page Allow to set reference names for triggers and check validaties for inputs. Summary for things we need for inside Login page

Parameters:

FlaskForm: make sure reference names are matching

Changelog:

4/19 Ali
